title: The Trend Of Democracy 3/2: Lonzo Ball, Andrew Cuomo, Madison Cawthorn, Bunny Wailer, Greg Abbott
itunes:title: The Trend Of Democracy 3/2: Lonzo Ball, Andrew Cuomo, Madison Cawthorn, Bunny Wailer, Greg Abbott
description:
On this edition of The Trend Of Democracy Jack and Miles discuss the recent performance of Lonzo Ball, Andrew Cuomo is facing sexual abuse allegations, Madison Cawthorn is facing similar predatory sexual allegations, the last of The Wailers, Bunny Wailer, has passed, and Greg Abbott has decided the state of Texas is open 100%.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
